entry.title: Enable Hyper-V Service
entry.content:
Scene

  • After installed Docker Desktop , Cannot enable Hyper-V service.

Solution

  • Check Windows Configuration.
  • win + r , input â€œcmdâ€.
  • Execute systeminfo.
  • Must all the Hyper-V Requirements are YES.

  • For me , â€œVirutalization Enabled In Firmware : NOâ€.

  • My PC mainboard is Interl H61 , Click â€œdeleteâ€ button show the Bios.

  • Then, Find and Enabled the Virutalization Configuration.

  • Final, Check the systeminfo , Open the Docker Desktop as well.

Other

  • ğŸ‘‰ Windows 10 Hyper-V System Requirements
entry.summary:
Scene

  • After installed Docker Desktop , Cannot enable Hyper-V service.

entry.title: Selfhost PhotoPrism
entry.content:
Scene

  • Better to manage a large number of pictures with photoprism
  • Demo => demo.photoprism

Solution

  • If host on windows must install docker at frist. ğŸ‘‰ Docker Desktop

  1. Make the docker-compose.yml and Modify configuration.

    • where I sign â€œ(^.^)â€,it mean should be change.

  2. Move the â€œdocker-compose.ymlâ€ , where you will install the PhotoPrism.

    • E.g : â€œC:\PhotoPrismâ€(Win) or â€œ/app/PhotoPrismâ€(Linux)

  3. Then, to the â€œdocker-compose.ymlâ€ directory , execute docker-compose up -d

  4. Final,Open http://localhost:2342/ in a Web browser.

Other

  • ğŸ‘‰ PhotoPrism
  • ğŸ‘‰ PhotoPrism Setup Using Docker Compose
entry.summary:
Scene

  • Better to manage a large number of pictures with photoprism
  • Demo => demo.photoprism

entry.title: Disable Windows Update
entry.content:
Scene

  • Disable Windows Update

Solution

  • win + r , input â€œservices.mscâ€
  • win + r , input â€œregeditâ€
  • make item â€œWindowsUpdateâ€
  • make item â€œAUâ€
  • make DWORD â€œAUOptionsâ€
  • value â€œ2â€
entry.summary:
Scene

  • Disable Windows Update

entry.title: Get AZ-900 Certification
entry.content:
Prepare

  • ğŸ‘‰ Exam AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
  • Schedule exam
  • Review examination on the site Or outside materials
    • ğŸ‘‰AZ-900
    • ğŸ‘‰AZ-900.bakLink

If Pass

  • Receive Mail
  • Get the Certification
  • Check on
    • Profile => Certifications ğŸ‘‰ docs.microsoft.com
    • ğŸ‘‰ credly
